resources.string: Display the calendar to pick the dates
We are going on a trip to %s from %s to %s!
An eccentric, alcoholic scientist with exceptional intelligence but rather questionable behavior. He is Morty\'s grandfather and often takes his grandson on dangerous intergalactic adventures.
Rick\'s grandson is a normal teenager who often accompanies his grandfather on his adventures. Despite being naive, Morty has a kind heart and tries to do the right thing in difficult situations.
Morty\'s older sister, she is a popular teenager and often worries about issues typical of her age. Despite this, throughout the series she proves to be intelligent and brave in various situations.

Rick\'s daughter and Morty and Summer\'s mother. She is a smart surgeon but insecure in her personal life. She has a complex relationship with her father and tries to find a balance between her family and professional life.
He is Beth\'s husband and Rick\'s father-in-law. He has a mundane job and is often shown as an insecure and clumsy person. Despite his flaws, he tries to be a good father and husband.
A mysterious and powerful character from the series who resides on the planet Abadango. He possesses exceptional abilities and an important role in some stories.

A clone created by Rick that combines characteristics of Abraham Lincoln and Adolf Hitler. He struggles with his identity and seeks to be morally correct, but his contradictions make him a complex character.
He is a high-ranking character on the Galactic Council. He has the authority to rule over Ricks and Mortys throughout the multiverse.
A character who leads a secret agency, he is a man with great authority and control over his organization.
A superhero who has the ability to control trains and is part of a superhero team known as the Vindicators.
In the context of the series, he is a famous and renowned scientist whose existence is present in the multiverse.
A character who appears in some episodes, he is known for his cunning and handling of complicated situations.
An alien character who appears in the series, although he does not have a prominent role or specific information in the main plot.
He is an alien version of Morty Smith, with some characteristics and attributes different from the original version.
Similar to Alien Morty, this version is an alien representation of Rick Sanchez, with variations on his traits and personality.
A unique character who mixes elements of cyborg technology with the lifestyle and practices of the Amish community, making him intriguing in the series.
A recurring character in some episodes, she is known for her relationship with one of the main characters and for her participation in some adventures.
Another variant of Morty, characterized by having antennas, possibly from an alternate dimension or parallel universe.
Similar to Antenna Morty, he is a version of Rick with antennas, indicating his origin in some different universe.
A quirky character known for his advertising slogan. Despite his apparent lack of eyes, he enthusiastically sells products in commercials within the series.
